name: Banana Chocolate-Chip Muffins
method: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix the flour and sugar.
Add the chocolate chips and mashed bananas.
Pour the batter into muffin tins.
Bake for 20-25 minutes.
review: These muffins are delicious and easy to make.

name: S'mores Brownies
method: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Prepare the brownie mix according to the package instructions.
Pour half of the batter into a baking dish.
Sprinkle with graham crackers and marshmallows.
Pour the remaining batter on top.
Bake for 25-30 minutes.
review: A delightful twist on the classic brownie.
